description: Whether you're a gram-counting thru-hiker, a kitchen-sink backpacker, or a passionate dayhiker, the Trail Sender™ Jacket is light, comfortable, and durable enough for any trail traveler. Mountain Hardwear's lightest trail jacket that combines an athletic design with classic ripstop fabric, this style also features plenty of pocket storage and sun protection to help keep you outside longer.
name: Mountain Hardwear Trail Sender Jacket - Mens
